title: bi update: still bi.
body:
summary: don’t worry, dan howell is still bi.
genre: fluff ? 
word count: 1.1k
author’s notes: i’ve always found fanfics about real people a little bit weird tbh but i got this idea and there was no stopping me. probably a little messy and not that great but it’s been so long since i’ve written literally anything so ! let me know what you think !

summary: listen, not that this is remotely the blog inspiring this rant of mine because you're such a godtier demon, but listen-- ...
question: listen, not that this is remotely the blog inspiring this rant of mine because you're such a godtier demon, but listen--  "dannie" this and "phillie" that yada yada yada i'm WEAK! i'm in love with whichever of them is currently in my field of vision! they're both on the screen?? I'm in love with whoever smiled most recently! I'm weak!! I'm too gay to choose between my dads, i'm just a weepy 26 year old dyke and they're lesbian icons, i'm too weak, i love them BOTH!!!!
answer: mood. mood mood mood. i ghost-wrote this. if anyone ever asks if i’m a dannie or a phillie, please refer to this post.

tags: okay yes im tagging dan for attention fight me
summary: He delivered those new HQ photos with the launch of his merch collection and I took advantage. Felt like I’d been waiting so...
caption: He delivered those new HQ photos with the launch of his merch collection and I took advantage. Felt like I’d been waiting so long for a good picture of @amazingphil to draw (and the time to actually do it) but today I could finally spend a few hours alone with his face. Had a blast, such a good face.

summary: Dan and Phil: *Have never referred to each other as anything more than best friends, clearly have separate rooms, don't talk...
question: Dan and Phil: *Have never referred to each other as anything more than best friends, clearly have separate rooms, don't talk about relationships.*/ Phannies: They're just closeted. It's unfair to assume anything of them simply because they haven't said it./ Dan and Phil: *touch each others shoulders*/ Phannies: Oh my god! Did you see that? They're so in love, there's no other explanation! They're just so married!
answer: they are so gay ! gay icon ! also don’t label people it’s bad ! male friendship doesn’t exist ! if you don’t see the gay relationship in dan and phil you are homophobic !

summary: in the darkness, with you - chapter 6: fatigue
title: in the darkness, with you - chapter 6: fatigue
body:
Read from the start: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36415200

Read chapter 6: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36927972

The majority of this is pre-written and will be posted regularly!

THANK YOU to my amazing beta @insectbah  ❤️

Summary:
Phil, 28, video editor.
Phil doesn’t believe in love at first sight, and that is not about to change anytime soon. But what about lust? Just two short weeks ago, he’d say no, definitely not.

Not anymore. Not since he first locked eyes with Dan, the new intern at the company he works for. Not since he first thought, “I want him”.

Phil’s wish does come true, but there’s a catch.
It doesn’t mean anything.

Excerpt from chapter 6:
“It’s your face. You’ve got that – that look on your face, like… Like when you’re upset, you look so different,” Dan says. His voice falters at the end.
“I wasn’t aware that you care about the look on my face, Dan,” Phil retorts, unable to resist.
“Why wouldn’t I? I’m not trying to hate you, you know. I just don’t want to like you.”
Phil almost audibly groans at hearing this; often he’d like to punch Dan just as much as he wants to snog him.
